body_html:
Platform is Arch Linux (4.8.6-1, GeForce GTX 960M), Virtualenv installation, so, no sandboxes..

Wget works just fine and looks like it has nothing to do with that specific package. It's just extremely flaky and fails all the time on different packages either with time out either with no route to host. It's not the best connection (~100Mbps), but I believe it should be enough. Is there any way to increase timeouts for .configure?
